help:
=========NORMIT=========
Usage:
normit 'source_language' 'target_language' 'text'

Example: normit en fr 'hey cowboy where is your horse?'
=> 'hey cow-boy ou est votre cheval?'

Options:
-t - speech synthesis

Check docs at: github.com/pawurb/normit
noPlayerMac:
NORMIT: speech synthesis requires mpg123 installed.
Please run 'brew install mpg123'
noPlayerWin:
NORMIT: speech synthesis requires mpg123 installed.
Please download from link 'https://www.mpg123.de'
noPlayerOther:
NORMIT: speech synthesis requires mpg123 installed.
Please run 'apt-get install mpg123'
wrongParams: NORMIT: Wrong data. Example: 'normit en es the cowboy' => 'el vaquero'
connectionErr: NORMIT: There seems to be a problem with your internet connection, or the language codes you provided are invalid
cannotSpeak: NORMIT: Speech synthesis is not supported for this language.
